name: Spork of Winter
description:
Spork of Winter

Entry to Touhou Fan Game Jam 10. Embrace the spoon goat (Yuuma Toutetsu) and her comically large spork as you deal with some troublesome snowmen. 

Music didn't quite make it into the game. I recommend playing Yuuma's arranged themes from Touhou 17.5 by ziki_7 in the background. They can be found on Youtube. 

Controls Keyboard + Mouse Attack with SporkLeft Mouse ButtonCatch SnowballRight Mouse ButtonEat Caught Snowball (Restores Health)SpaceThrow Caught SnowballLeft Mouse Button Gamepad Attack with SporkRight BumperCatch SnowballLeft BumperEat Caught Snowball (Restores Health)XThrow Caught SnowballRight Bumper External Assets
